author: Russian Bot
comment: Nice inspired design, but the hands tend to blend into the background, making them hard to see. Also, the weather always displays 32°F and never updates. Oh, and two mobile battery meters seems a little redundant.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Libo,We really pleased that you love our watch face and sincere thanks for taking time to let us know your ideas.You can long press the watch face and change time interval of temperature Thank you for your time

title: Execution could be better

author: Rudy Saenz
comment: Love the look of this watch face, but I have to agree with some other users. I would love to have the capability to adjust digital clock (12/24hr Mode), and disable indicators (rather than just off), google fit integration (Not a fan of software running its own calculation on steps), adjust second hand to a firmer motion (rather than smooth, consuming more battery life), but I still love the look!. I am having a problem where the hands are in the background , the phone battery always shows low (even with 100% charge), and the color settings do not stay locked in upon waking, it keeps defaulting to tan.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Rudy,we really pleased that you love our watch face and sincere thanks for taking time to let us know your ideas.You can long press the watch face and change the 12 to 24 hours clock and vice versa ,we will look into the issue you said and fix it soon ,kindly reconsider your reviews ,Thank you

author: brett yerks
comment: But functionality is getting brutal. Says I do not a functioning heart rate monitor. Sliding down the options menu changes the color of watch if unlocked. Wish I could change options from phone. Also edit location of stats on face. Edit: after uninstalled and reset phone. Heart rate works after install.E dit 2: still no improvement. Re-rated stars. Uninstalled.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi breet,Very sorry to hear you've experienced this issue,IF you are a marshmallow user you need to give permission to each sensor ,we are covering other issue you mention  in our next update which will hit you soon, Thanks for your Feedback

title: Love the look

author: Jeppe Allerslev
comment: I could tolerate your excessive advertising on  reddit, because the watch face is not actually that bad, but now I get a freaking advertisement in my notifications!? Because of an app I paid for!? That is just too greedy. I urge not to buy this, since the dev is obviously just a greedy SOB

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi jeppe,Very sorry to hear you've experience this issue from our side, We can assure this wont be happens in future,Thank you for your time

title: Really!?

author: Marcus Thomas
comment: At first glance, this watch face looks great, but, once it's on your wrist, you notice quite a few problems. The digital clock is showing 9:3 instead of 9:03, you can read the analog hands between the 11 and 1 markings, the thick white horizontal white line in the middle of the face is too thick and distracting, and there's not enough freedom to change the colors as you see fit.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Marcus,Thank you for pointing out the defect. We are covering these issue in our future update we will try to fix this as soon as possbile  ,Thank you for the feed back

title: Meh. It looked promising, but has some issues.

author: David Kerkes
comment: This watch face is really nice. The only problem I have is I can not figure out how to change the digital time display to normal time instead of army time.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi David ,WE are covering these things in future update which will hit you soon and thank you for the ideas and valuable time

title: Really nice.

author: vasko002
comment: I like the way it represents the information, but a dark ambient mode with bright hands would be very good for OLED screens and battery usage. Either do that or have an ambient which just makes the normal mode dimmer. UPDATE: New ambient mode is great there's still options to be explored but the black face + black ambient mode combination makes the face a lot more natural.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Vasko ,Thank you for updating the reviews and for your support

author: Hendrik Appel
comment: Looks great, but the contrast between the hands and watch face aren't large enough, so I can't always tell where the hands are!

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Henco,Thank you for pointing out the defect. We are covering these issue in our future update we will try to fix this as soon as possbile  ,Thank you for the feed back

author: Go Away
comment: Advertisements in notifications

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi ,Very sorry to hear you've experience this issue from our side, We can assure this wont be happens in future,Thank you for your time

author: Jeffrey -
comment: Great watch face the only minor is when you're in dimmed mode it's a bit hard to read the time as half of the clock is not readable anymore. Maybe a bigger digital time in dim mode and no analog or take out the white/dark theme and make it either completely white or completely dark and opposite color hand of time but for the rest I like it a lot. Even better if you could change that but just in dim mode.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Jeffy, We are happy to know that you like the watch face.  We will consider your proposition in our next update, Thanks for your Support

author: Jason Cornejo
comment: Massive cause of battery drain both on phone and Moto 360, even with my extended battery I only get 4 hours of SOT when I usually get 8-9 hours, and my watch usually lasts all day (7am-9pm) with about 30% left, with this it's at 30% around 3:30pm. Love the design but it causes too much battery drain to be used

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Jason, We are glad that you Love our design, you can switch on/off the sensors  then  sure your watch will stand long hours as it saves battery ,To know more details about  setting visit this link http://insideglobe.com/watch-face-with-unique-phone-unlock-counter/ ,Kindly reconsider your reviews  Thank you for your  feedback

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Graham,Very sorry to hear you've experience this issue from our side, We can assure this wont be happens in future,Thank you for your time

author: Sheldon Hopkins
comment: Love to have digital time display

author: Jorge Balboa
comment: Love the design but after I installed it on my Moto 360 went from 71% battery to 14% in less than 2 hours. My Moto X Pure Style also suffered heavy battery drain as well. It went from 46% to 19% in the same 2 hours after I installed Backlash. GPS immediately is turned on once the app is downloaded and there is no way to adjust this setting. This seems like a wake lock issue. Fix this issue and 5 stars for a brilliant design.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: WE are happy that you liked the design,check our new update with new option switch on/off the sensor heart rate and also the step sensor sure your watch will long hours as we save battery,look into it http://insideglobe.com/watch-face-with-unique-phone-unlock-counter/ for more details, kindly reconsider your reviews, Thank you for your  feedback
